column2: I didnt want to like it. It gives off this chic
column3: central market deli vibe that normally would turn me off. I wanted to get the duck confit sandwich
column4: but they had run out. they had the turkey confit instead
column5: which I accepted begrudgingly. Â I didn't realize that the bread was simple
